name: Biggest Little Flight School
about: Biggest Little Flight School, formerly Advanced Aviation, offers top-notch flight training under new ownership since September 2023. Our fleet includes five IFR-capable Cessna 172s, each equipped with advanced avionics such as Avidyne and Garmin navigators, ADSB in and out, and Aspen Glass Panel displays. We also have a Piper Arrow for complex and high-performance training. Our experienced instructors provide customized training tailored to your schedule and learning curve, with expertise in primary, instrument, commercial, and CFI ratings. Our in-house maintenance ensures safe and reliable aircraft, and our simulator is certified for various training hours. We offer a personalized, family-owned business approach with flexible scheduling and a focus on safety and fun. Discover the freedom of flying with our discovery flights and enjoy the hometown feel of our training environment. Join us to achieve your aviation goals with quality instruction and excellent value.
